Instance Method# linearInterpolate(bufferB:interpolationConstant:destination:)

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
func linearInterpolate(
    bufferB: vImage.PixelBuffer<Format>,
    interpolationConstant: Float,
    destination: vImage.PixelBuffer<Format>
)
```

Available when `Format` conforms to `StaticPixelFormat` and `Format.ComponentType` is `Float`.
